info.author: Aristos Data, LLC.
classifiers: Intended Audience :: Financial and Insurance Industry
info.description:
# Open Aristos Client for Python
A modern approach to financial data platforms.  

[![Slack Status](https://img.shields.io/badge/slack-join_chat-white.svg?logo=slack&style=social)](http://openaristos.slack.com/)

## Installation
Installing the Open Aristos Python Client takes just a few seconds:
```bash
pip install openaristos-python
```

## Examples
Explore the examples in order to gain an understanding for how to make data requests. 

```bash
├── examples
│   └── basic.py
│   └── spark.py
```

## Spark Integration
Access your data in Spark, follow these steps to get started:

Pull spark for docker.
```bash
docker pull jupyter/pyspark-notebook
```

Launch a local spark single node cluster.
```bash
docker run -it --rm -p 8888:8888 --name pyspark jupyter/pyspark-notebook
```

Copy the python package from local into container and then install it (you must do this every time you restart container)
```bash
docker cp ./dist/openaristos-python-0.1.0.tar.gz pyspark:/tmp
docker exec -it pyspark python3.7 -m pip install /tmp/openaristos-python-0.1.0.tar.gz
```

Fire up a PySpark notebook using the URL seen during container startup, example below.
```
[I 14:30:39.182 NotebookApp] The Jupyter Notebook is running at:
[I 14:30:39.182 NotebookApp] http://fd2bc8135ff9:8888/?token=1a260d17cee5017a5b5476c2a33e08782237c0920c28c340
[I 14:30:39.182 NotebookApp]  or http://127.0.0.1:8888/?token=1a260d17cee5017a5b5476c2a33e08782237c0920c28c340
```

Copyright (C) 2020 Aristos Data, LLC
